title: National Literature Prize for Narrative
text:
The National Literature Prize for Narrative (Spanish: "Premio Nacional de Literatura en la modalidad de Narrativa") is a prize awarded by Spain's <a href="Ministry%20of%20Culture%20%28Spain%29">Ministry of Culture</a> for a novel written by a Spanish author in any of the languages of Spain. The prize is 20,000 <a href="euro">euro</a>s.
Prior to 1977, the prize appeared and disappeared several times, being given by different institutions.
